title: El Salvador Bitcoin-Friendly Nayib Bukele To Stay In Power Indefinitely
body: El Salvador’s ruling party has made a major political shift. El Salvador’s ruling party has approved a big change to the constitution. This new rule could allow President Nayib Bukele to stay in office for as many terms as he wants, provided he continues to get elected. The decision was made quickly and is already causing strong reactions both in El Salvador and around the world. This is especially given Bukele’s close ties to the country’s bold Bitcoin (BTC) strategy. El Salvador Opens the Door to Indefinite Presidencies On Thursday, lawmakers from Bukele’s New Ideas party passed five major constitutional changes with a 57-3 vote. The new rules allow a president to run for office as many times as they want. The ruling political leaders also changed the presidential term from 5 years to 6 and removed the need for a second round of voting. These changes were passed quickly, with little public discussion. Some people are worried that this hurts democracy and transparency. Ana Figueroa, a lawmaker who proposed the bill, defended the reforms as a way to give voters more direct power over who governs them. She argued that citizens should decide how long a president or elected official stays in office. President Bukele Builds a Bitcoin Legacy President Bukele began his second term on June 1, 2024. During his time in office, he has gained international attention for adopting Bitcoin as legal tender in 2021. Since then, El Salvador has continued to purchase more of the top cryptocurrency and now owns approximately 6,246 BTC, despite pressure from global financial groups. People who support the new law think Bukele’s leadership could help grow the country’s economy, especially through digital and crypto projects. They argue that his unique approach has brought international attention and innovation to the government. Recently, Bolivia’s Central Bank (BCB) partnered with El Salvador’s National Commission of Digital Assets (CNAD). They planned to work together to improve rules for digital assets and develop blockchain technology. Although Bukele has not confirmed whether he will run again, this legal pathway still gives him, or any future president, the option to remain in power indefinitely, as long as they are elected. Critics Say Democracy Is in Danger in El Salvador Not everyone agrees with the changes. Some people believe the new rules weaken democracy and give too much power to one person. Marcela Villatoro, a lawmaker from the opposition Republican National Alliance (ARENA), strongly criticized the decision. He called it a blow to the country’s democratic foundations. Human rights groups also raised an alarm. Noah Bullock, executive director of Cristosal, condemned the process used to pass the reforms. He noted that it was done quickly, without public awareness or meaningful debate. He warned that El Salvador is starting to look like countries with dictators, where leaders change the laws to stay in power, and there are no firm limits to stop them. The post El Salvador Bitcoin-Friendly Nayib Bukele To Stay In Power Indefinitely appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Crypto slowdown drags Coinbase down
body: Coinbase shares crashed 15% on Friday after the company disappointed investors with weak second-quarter numbers. The crypto exchange posted a sharp drop in adjusted profit, pushing its stock to $321.68, the lowest it’s been in over a month. The selloff, which wiped out $14.3 billion in value, came after Coinbase reported just $33.2 million in adjusted income, way down from the $294.4 million it brought in during the same quarter last year. The results landed badly across Wall Street, where expectations had already been high after Coinbase joined the S&P 500 in May and ran up 52% year-to-date going into the earnings. According to Reuters, analyst Michael Miller from Morningstar called the shares “significantly overvalued,” adding, “We believe that the market is projecting too much future growth for the firm.” H.C. Wainwright analysts echoed that, saying, “We believe investor enthusiasm had reached a ‘fever pitch’ heading into last night’s results, as valuation has detached from underlying fundamentals.” Crypto slowdown drags Coinbase down The weak results were tied directly to slower trading. Coinbase struggled with low trading volumes throughout the quarter as the recent bullish sentiment in crypto markets made traders hold onto assets instead of selling. Less trading meant less revenue for the exchange, and that hit profits hard. The volatility that Coinbase normally benefits from just wasn’t there during the period. Meanwhile, Robinhood reported that its crypto trading revenue nearly doubled during the same quarter. Robinhood has a much smaller presence in the crypto market than Coinbase, but it managed to pull ahead due to a spike in trading activity. That contrast only deepened the pressure on Coinbase to explain the drop. Some analysts think the slowdown may be temporary. Coinbase’s revenue estimates for July pointed to stronger activity, likely boosted by the Genius Act, which became law that same month. The legislation fueled a new wave of crypto optimism, sending bitcoin to an all-time high and possibly reigniting the kind of trading activity Coinbase needs to recover. But none of that helped the company on Friday, when investors responded directly to the second-quarter collapse. The earnings miss also hit other crypto-related stocks. Circle fell 4%, Galaxy Digital dropped 2%, and Bitmine Immersion, which holds ether reserves, tumbled 8%. MicroStrategy, which holds a large bitcoin treasury, lost 5%. Coinbase was the worst hit among them all. Amazon slips after earnings call disappoints Wall Street Amazon also took a beating. The company released its second-quarter earnings on Thursday and beat expectations in most categories, but it wasn’t enough. The stock dropped during the conference call and closed 7% lower on Friday. For the year, it’s now down around 1%, a rare position for a company that usually stays on the green side of the chart. The market’s reaction made it clear that beating estimates alone wasn’t enough anymore, not without stronger signals on growth, margins, or strategy going forward. At the same time, crypto markets were hit by a broader pullback after President Donald Trump introduced a revised version of his “reciprocal” tariffs targeting multiple countries. Bitcoin managed to stay roughly flat, but other top tokens didn’t. Ether, XRP, and Binance Coin all lost 2%. Overnight, bitcoin touched $114,110.73, triggering long liquidations across the board. That means traders using leverage were forced to sell when the price dropped. Bitcoin saw $172 million worth of these forced sales in 24 hours. Ether lost even more, with $210 million in liquidations on centralized exchanges. Even after a strong July, where bitcoin rose 8% and ether soared 49%, the mood has changed. Uncertainty is back. Lower trading volumes and higher volatility in August are making investors nervous. That has everyone watching whether the momentum will last. ETF flows also showed cracks. Ether ETFs pulled in over $5 billion in July. There was only one outflow day—July 2, when $1.8 million came out. That pushed cumulative inflows for ether ETFs to $9.64 billion. But bitcoin ETFs saw the reverse. $114 million left bitcoin ETFs on the last day of July, dropping the monthly net inflow to $6 billion. That’s out of a total of $55 billion that’s gone into bitcoin ETFs overall so far. Get seen where it counts. Advertise in Cryptopolitan Research and reach crypto’s sharpest investors and builders.

History also points to Dogecoin climbing above the $1.42 and $2.11 levels after, which is increase of more… pic.twitter.com/knJOk6VGfQ — JAVON MARKS (@JavonTM1) July 30, 2025 Dogecoin Price Analysis: Is the 200% Move Back In Play? Meanwhile, the MACD line is converging toward a golden cross above the signal line, an early sign of a short-term uptrend forming on the 4-hour timeframe . The key level to watch is a reclaim of prior support at $0.22 to confirm this isn’t a false breakout. If confirmed, the breakout path could progress toward resistance at $0.245 and eventually the July peak at $0.28 — a potential 37% move . With sustained momentum, DOGE could even make a run toward the $0.3760 target forecast by Swanson , especially with spot DOGE ETFs expected to unlock new waves of institutional demand. title: Blockchain Funding: Subzero Labs Secures Monumental $20M for Rialo Blockchain
body: BitcoinWorld Blockchain Funding: Subzero Labs Secures Monumental $20M for Rialo Blockchain The world of decentralized technology is constantly evolving, with new innovations and significant investments shaping its future. A recent announcement has sent ripples through the industry, highlighting the continued confidence of major investors in the potential of groundbreaking projects. Subzero Labs, a company dedicated to building robust decentralized infrastructure, has successfully attracted a monumental $20 million in blockchain funding , marking a significant milestone in its journey. This substantial investment is poised to accelerate the development of Rialo, an ambitious new blockchain platform. Such significant blockchain funding rounds are not just financial transactions; they are strong indicators of where the industry’s smart money believes the next wave of innovation will emerge. They signal a belief in the long-term viability and transformative power of decentralized solutions. Blockchain Funding: A Deep Dive into Subzero Labs’ $20 Million Triumph The recent news, initially reported by Fortune, details how Subzero Labs secured an impressive $20 million in a seed funding round. This level of early-stage blockchain funding is noteworthy, especially in a market that has seen its share of fluctuations. The round was spearheaded by Pantera Capital, a name synonymous with pioneering investments in the cryptocurrency and blockchain space. Their leadership in this investment round underscores a strong vote of confidence in Subzero Labs’ vision and the underlying technology they are developing. Adding further weight to the round was the participation of Variant, the venture arm of Coinbase. Coinbase’s venture capital arm has a strategic focus on supporting projects that align with the broader growth and adoption of decentralized technologies. Their involvement suggests a careful evaluation of Subzero Labs’ potential and the strategic importance of the Rialo blockchain within the ecosystem. This collective show of support from prominent venture capital firms provides Subzero Labs with the necessary capital to scale its operations, attract top talent, and dedicate resources to the intricate process of building a new blockchain from the ground up. The injection of such significant blockchain funding is critical for long-term development and achieving the ambitious goals set for Rialo. What is Rialo Blockchain and Why Does it Matter for Decentralized Infrastructure? At the core of Subzero Labs’ mission is the creation of Rialo, a blockchain designed to serve as foundational decentralized infrastructure. While specific technical details about Rialo are still emerging, the focus on ‘decentralized infrastructure’ suggests it aims to address fundamental challenges that current blockchain networks face. These challenges often include scalability limitations, interoperability issues between different chains, and the need for enhanced security and true decentralization. A new blockchain entering the market must offer compelling advantages to stand out. Rialo is expected to contribute to the evolution of Web3 by providing a more robust, efficient, or specialized platform for decentralized applications (dApps), smart contracts, and various digital assets. Its significance lies in its potential to: Improve Scalability: Facilitate a higher volume of transactions per second, enabling broader adoption for mainstream use cases. Enhance Interoperability: Allow seamless communication and asset transfer between Rialo and other blockchain networks. Strengthen Security: Implement advanced cryptographic techniques and consensus mechanisms to protect against vulnerabilities. Foster Decentralization: Design a network architecture that resists centralized control, ensuring censorship resistance and transparency. The success of Rialo will depend on its ability to deliver on these promises and carve out a niche in the competitive blockchain landscape. This initial blockchain funding provides the runway needed to execute on these complex technical objectives. Navigating the Future: Challenges and Opportunities in Decentralized Infrastructure The journey of building and launching a new blockchain, even with substantial blockchain funding , is fraught with both immense opportunities and considerable challenges. Decentralized infrastructure, while promising, faces several hurdles that projects like Rialo must overcome. Opportunities: Innovation Catalyst: A new, optimized blockchain can unlock novel applications and business models not feasible on existing networks. Market Growth: The overall cryptocurrency market continues to expand, creating demand for diverse and specialized blockchain solutions. Global Reach: Decentralized networks inherently possess a global reach, fostering inclusive financial systems and digital economies. Challenges: Challenge Area Description Regulatory Uncertainty Evolving global regulations can impact development, adoption, and compliance requirements for new blockchains. Technical Complexity Building a secure, scalable, and decentralized blockchain requires significant technical expertise and continuous innovation. User Adoption Convincing developers and users to migrate to a new ecosystem requires strong incentives, ease of use, and robust tooling. Competition The blockchain space is highly competitive, with established players and new entrants constantly vying for market share. Subzero Labs, armed with significant blockchain funding , will need to strategically navigate these challenges, leveraging its resources to innovate and differentiate Rialo in a crowded market. The success of its infrastructure will depend on its ability to offer tangible improvements over existing solutions. Who are the Key Players Behind This Pivotal Blockchain Funding? The caliber of investors participating in a funding round often speaks volumes about the perceived potential of a project. In the case of Subzero Labs’ $20 million blockchain funding , the involvement of Pantera Capital and Variant is particularly noteworthy. Pantera Capital: Recognized as one of the earliest and largest institutional investors in blockchain and cryptocurrency, Pantera Capital has a long history of backing transformative projects. Founded in 2003, they pivoted to focus on blockchain in 2013, making them true pioneers in the space. Their portfolio includes investments in many of today’s leading blockchain companies. Pantera’s decision to lead this seed round indicates a strong belief in Subzero Labs’ team and the foundational impact Rialo could have on the decentralized ecosystem. Variant (Coinbase Venture Arm): Variant operates as the venture capital arm of Coinbase, one of the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchanges. Variant’s investment strategy often aligns with Coinbase’s broader mission of accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency and decentralized technologies. Their participation suggests that Rialo’s development could be strategically important for the wider Web3 movement, potentially integrating with or complementing existing infrastructure that Coinbase supports. These investors bring not only capital but also extensive industry expertise, networks, and strategic guidance, which are invaluable assets for a startup building a complex project like a new blockchain. Their collective endorsement through this blockchain funding round lends significant credibility to Subzero Labs. Actionable Insights: What This Investment Means for the Crypto Landscape The $20 million blockchain funding secured by Subzero Labs for its Rialo project offers several key insights into the current state and future direction of the cryptocurrency and blockchain industry: Continued Institutional Confidence: This significant seed round demonstrates that despite market volatility, institutional investors retain strong confidence in the long-term potential of decentralized technologies, especially those focused on foundational infrastructure. Focus on Core Infrastructure: The investment highlights a trend towards backing projects that aim to solve fundamental challenges within the blockchain space, such as scalability, security, and interoperability, rather than just consumer-facing applications. Robust infrastructure is seen as essential for the next wave of adoption. Strategic Partnerships are Key: The involvement of major players like Pantera Capital and Coinbase’s Variant suggests that strategic partnerships and credible backing are becoming increasingly important for new projects to gain traction and succeed. Long-Term Vision Prevails: Seed funding for a new blockchain indicates a commitment to long-term development cycles, recognizing that building secure and scalable decentralized networks requires time, significant resources, and sustained effort. For those observing the market, this investment serves as a reminder that innovation continues to thrive beneath the surface, with substantial capital flowing into projects poised to shape the future of Web3. The success of Rialo, bolstered by this crucial blockchain funding , could set a precedent for future infrastructure-focused ventures. Subzero Labs’ success in securing $20 million in blockchain funding for its Rialo project is a testament to the enduring belief in decentralized innovation. Led by industry giants Pantera Capital and supported by Variant, this investment provides a powerful impetus for the development of a new foundational blockchain. As Rialo takes shape, it has the potential to address critical infrastructure needs, contributing to a more scalable, secure, and interconnected decentralized future. This pivotal funding not only fuels Subzero Labs’ ambitions but also signals a broader trend of confidence and investment in the core technologies that will underpin the next generation of the internet. The landscape of blockchain funding continues to evolve, supporting new innovations. Blockchain Funding: Subzero Labs Secures Monumental $20M for Rialo Blockchain Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Subzero Labs? Subzero Labs is a company focused on building decentralized infrastructure. Their primary current project is the development of a new blockchain named Rialo. What is Rialo blockchain? Rialo is a new blockchain being developed by Subzero Labs with the aim of providing foundational decentralized infrastructure. While specific technical details are still emerging, it is expected to focus on improving aspects like scalability, security, and interoperability within the blockchain ecosystem. Who invested in Subzero Labs’ $20 million funding round? The $20 million seed funding round for Subzero Labs was led by Pantera Capital, a prominent venture capital firm specializing in blockchain investments. Variant, the venture arm of Coinbase, also participated in the round. Why is this blockchain funding significant? This $20 million blockchain funding is significant because it represents a substantial investment in early-stage decentralized infrastructure development. It demonstrates strong institutional confidence from major crypto investors like Pantera Capital and Variant, indicating a belief in the long-term potential of projects that build foundational blockchain technology. What are the potential impacts of Rialo on the crypto landscape? Rialo has the potential to contribute to the crypto landscape by offering a new, potentially more efficient or specialized, decentralized infrastructure. If successful, it could enhance scalability, improve interoperability between chains, and provide a robust platform for new decentralized applications, driving further innovation and adoption in the Web3 space. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your network on social media to spread the word about the latest developments in blockchain funding and decentralized infrastructure! To learn more about the latest blockchain funding trends, explore our article on key developments shaping decentralized infrastructure institutional adoption. title: Google Investment Revolutionizes Indian Social Gaming: STAN’s Bold Future
body: BitcoinWorld Google Investment Revolutionizes Indian Social Gaming: STAN’s Bold Future The world of gaming is constantly evolving, and a significant shift is underway in India’s vibrant digital landscape. Recently, a major development has captured the attention of tech enthusiasts and gamers alike: a substantial Google investment in STAN, an innovative Indian social gaming platform. This strategic move by Google’s AI Futures Fund signals a powerful endorsement of STAN’s unique approach to connecting gamers, creators, and communities, potentially reshaping how we interact and earn in the gaming sphere. Why is Google Investing Heavily in Indian Social Gaming? Google’s commitment to the burgeoning Indian tech scene is undeniable, and its latest move underscores this dedication. The Google investment in STAN is part of an impressive $8.5 million equity funding round. This round wasn’t just about Google; it attracted a formidable lineup of investors, including Japanese gaming giants Bandai Namco Entertainment and Square Enix, along with Reazon Holdings. Further strengthening the round were Aptos Labs and King River Capital, alongside existing backers General Catalyst and GFR Fund. Google’s participation, specifically through its AI Futures Fund, highlights a clear vision: to support startups that are not only innovative but also deeply integrate its advanced AI tools. This collective backing provides STAN with significant capital and strategic partnerships, positioning it for accelerated growth in the highly competitive social gaming market. What Makes STAN’s Gaming Platform Truly Unique? While many platforms aim to be the ‘hangout place for gamers,’ STAN distinguishes itself with a truly innovative monetization model within the Indian social gaming ecosystem. Headquartered in Singapore, STAN isn’t just another community platform; it’s designed to reward engagement. Users can earn an in-app currency called ‘Gems’ by actively participating in popular games like Krafton’s Battlegrounds Mobile India, Garena’s Free Fire Max, Minecraft, Call of Duty, and even casual titles such as Ludo and Snakes & Ladders. This reward system extends beyond gameplay; users can also earn Gems through referrals, a spin-to-win wheel, and daily rewards. The real appeal of these Gems lies in their redeemable value – they can be converted into vouchers for popular e-commerce platforms like Amazon, PhonePe, and Flipkart. This tangible reward system is a significant departure from platforms like Discord, where user interaction primarily yields ‘clout’ rather than direct monetary benefits. STAN also empowers creators to set up ‘Clubs’ – tailored chat rooms for specific games. While open to all, accessing ‘gaming experiences’ offered by creators requires a social currency payment, from which STAN takes a commission. This multi-faceted earning and spending model is a key differentiator, making the STAN gaming platform a compelling proposition for gamers looking for more than just social interaction. How is STAN Building a Dominant Gaming Community Platform? STAN’s ambition is clear: to become a leading gaming community platform , even shadowing giants like Discord. The company’s growth metrics suggest they are well on their way. STAN proudly reports over 25 million downloads across the Play Store and App Store, with a robust 5.5 million monthly active users. This impressive traction is attributed, in part, to a strategic shift last year. Initially, content creation was restricted, requiring creators to contact the company directly for streaming. However, opening the platform to user-generated content dramatically boosted both downloads and engagement, transforming STAN into a truly dynamic hub. Beyond individual users, STAN actively collaborates with game publishers, studios, and developers, including major players like Krafton, Garena, and Roblox. These partners pay STAN to connect them with the platform’s extensive network of gamers and creators, creating a ‘very interesting business stream.’ In the past two quarters alone, nearly 100 game publishers have joined, with more than 20 onboarding each month. This dual approach – user-centric rewards and publisher partnerships – positions STAN for sustained expansion. How Will AI in Gaming Revolutionize STAN’s User Experience? Looking ahead, STAN is poised to leverage Google’s backing to significantly enhance its offerings, particularly through the strategic integration of AI in gaming . A substantial 70% to 80% of moderation on STAN is already handled by AI, a testament to its current technological capabilities. The goal is to further reduce the need for human intervention in moderation, streamlining content oversight and ensuring a safer, more positive environment for its users. Beyond moderation, STAN plans to introduce AI-powered toolkits for creators. These tools will enable creators to produce avatars and memes effortlessly, provide quick reply suggestions, and efficiently filter out irrelevant chats. Co-founder and CEO Parth Chadha emphasizes the collaborative effort with Google’s team, stating, ‘There are a lot of interesting plug-and-play models, which we and the Google team are working together to leverage and scale the business.’ This focus on AI not only improves user experience but also empowers creators, fostering a richer, more interactive community. STAN’s international expansion plans, starting with the Indian subcontinent and then targeting Southeast Asia and Latin America, further underscore its ambitious vision for global reach, aiming for profitability by 2027. The Google investment in STAN represents more than just a financial transaction; it’s a strategic vote of confidence in a platform that is redefining social gaming in India. By uniquely blending community interaction with tangible rewards and embracing cutting-edge AI, STAN is charting a distinctive path in the global gaming landscape. Its rapid user growth, strong partnerships, and clear vision for AI-driven enhancements suggest a promising future. As STAN expands its reach and refines its offerings, it stands as a compelling example of how innovation, backed by major tech players, can transform an industry and create new opportunities for gamers and creators worldwide. To learn more about the latest AI in gaming trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features and institutional adoption. This post Google Investment Revolutionizes Indian Social Gaming: STAN’s Bold Future first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team
tags: AI News|AI Gaming|Google Investment|Indian Startups|Social Gaming|STAN Platform

title: Nintendo has sold 5.82 million units of its Switch 2 consoles since launching in June
body: Nintendo said on Friday its quarterly revenue for the period ending June 30 had doubled year-on-year due to the sale of Switch 2 gaming consoles. The consoles became the most successful gaming hardware sold ever by a firm after launch. The company sold 3.5 million Switch 2 consoles in the first four days after launch and 5.8 million by the end of June. Nintendo credits Switch 2 for surge in revenue Nintendo announced Switch 2 sold 5.82 million units worldwide in 25 days. pic.twitter.com/4r15EneAqc — Stealth (@Stealth40k) August 1, 2025 The Japanese company also reported a 19% increase in net profit in the quarter. Its profit growth came due to a 572 billion yen (132%) increase in sales in Q2. Its operating profit for the quarter totaled 56.9 billion yen, above LSEG’s estimates of 53.46 billion yen. Sales from the institution’s video game platform surged by 142.5%, to 555.5 billion. The firm said the Switch 2 consoles contributed much to its growth in the last quarter compared to its predecessor. Nintendo’s property-related business, including movies and entertainment based on its original games, recorded a 4.4% drop in sales. The firm said the drop was due to a decrease in revenue from The Super Mario Bros movie. Nintendo estimates an increase in revenue and operating profit for the year ending March 2026, to 1.9 trillion yen and 320 billion yen, respectively. The Kyoto-based firm believes the Switch 2 consoles will sell 15 million units this year, despite the heightened U.S. levies. Nathan Naidu of Bloomberg Intelligence believes that the establishment could surpass its target of 15 million units since it has already sold 40% of the target. “While there have been changes in the market environment since we announced our initial forecast for the fiscal year, such as the U.S. tariff measures, at this time there is no significant impact on our earnings forecast for this fiscal year.” -Nintendo. Morningstar’s researcher, Kazunori Ito, also believes that U.S. tariffs will not affect the firm’s financial prospects. He argued that the company will recoup losses in the long term by selling more games and increasing its overall gaming audience. The corporation also noted that its gross profit margin decreased by 29.5 points to 32.3%. The firm said the drop was due to hardware sales becoming higher with the launch of Switch 2. The console’s software sold 8.67 million units in Q1. The firm said it was because many consumers purchased the hardware bundled with Mario Kart World. The firm also acknowledged that there has been a scarcity of Switch 2 consoles in some countries. The Japanese company plans to boost its production and supply systems to cater to the demand for the hardware. The firm also noted that demand for the Nintendo Switch console remained after the launch of the new console in June. He revealed that despite new games from the Pokémon, Metroid, and Kirby franchises debuting later this year, the gaming community is asking for even more titles for the Switch 2 consoles. Nintendo Switch sees drop in sales The Switch 2 predecessor has sold 153 million units since its 2017 release, its success mainly driven by the pandemic boom in gaming. The gaming company continues to show steady sales despite having a 53.5% drop in sales for the Nintendo Switch console. The Nintendo Switch console is also among the top three gaming consoles, following PlayStation 2 and Nintendo DS. The institution said that the console needs to sell fewer than a million units to surpass sales from the Nintendo DS, with the target being to surpass Sony’s PS2 console. title: Gate US Unleashes Historic Crypto Trading Opportunities in 2025
body: BitcoinWorld Gate US Unleashes Historic Crypto Trading Opportunities in 2025 The cryptocurrency landscape in the United States is poised for a significant transformation. Imagine a scenario where a leading global crypto exchange, Gate.io, officially steps onto American soil, bringing its robust platform and extensive range of digital assets to a market eager for innovation. This is precisely what is unfolding, with Gate US launching spot crypto trading for American customers. This pivotal move is not just a strategic expansion for Gate.io; it signals a new era for crypto accessibility and regulatory clarity in the U.S., particularly as we look towards 2025 and beyond. What Does the Launch of Gate US Mean for American Investors? The entry of Gate US into the American market is a direct response to a much-improved regulatory environment. For years, the U.S. crypto space has been characterized by uncertainty, often hindering global players from offering their full suite of services. However, 2025 is anticipated to bring forth clearer guidelines and a more accommodating framework, paving the way for platforms like Gate US to operate with greater confidence and compliance. This development is crucial for several reasons: Increased Accessibility: American investors will gain access to a wider array of digital assets and trading pairs, potentially diversifying their portfolios beyond what is currently available on some domestic platforms. Enhanced Competition: The arrival of Gate US will undoubtedly intensify competition among crypto exchanges in the U.S. This competition often translates to better services, lower fees, and more innovative product offerings for users. Regulatory Compliance Focus: Gate.io’s decision to enter the U.S. market underscores its commitment to operating within established regulatory frameworks. This move can build greater trust among users and regulators alike, fostering a more secure trading environment. The shift in the regulatory climate is not merely about relaxation; it’s about clarity. When rules are well-defined, businesses can invest and innovate with less risk, ultimately benefiting consumers. The proactive steps taken by Gate.io to establish Gate US demonstrate foresight and adaptability in navigating complex legal landscapes. How Will Gate US Navigate the Competitive Landscape? The U.S. crypto market is vibrant but also highly competitive, with several established exchanges already serving millions of users. Gate US will need a robust strategy to carve out its niche. Here’s a look at how it might approach this challenge: Aspect Gate US Strategy Product Offering Focus on a broad selection of spot trading pairs, potentially including some less common assets approved for U.S. trading. Security & Compliance Emphasize robust security protocols and strict adherence to U.S. regulatory requirements, including AML/KYC. User Experience Provide an intuitive platform, competitive fee structures, and responsive customer support tailored for American users. Market Penetration Target specific demographics or niche markets, potentially through strategic partnerships or localized marketing campaigns. The success of Gate US will largely depend on its ability to differentiate itself while maintaining the high standards of security and compliance expected by U.S. regulators and users. Building trust will be paramount, especially given the history of regulatory scrutiny in the crypto space. What Are the Anticipated Benefits of Gate US for the Wider Crypto Ecosystem? Beyond direct benefits to individual investors, the entry of a major player like Gate US can have ripple effects across the entire U.S. crypto ecosystem. It signifies a maturation of the market and an increasing global confidence in its future. Increased Liquidity: More exchanges mean more trading volume, which generally leads to deeper liquidity for various digital assets. This can reduce price volatility and improve execution for traders. Innovation and Development: The heightened competition spurred by Gate US can drive other exchanges to innovate faster, leading to better technology, more user-friendly interfaces, and a wider range of financial products. Regulatory Precedent: A successful and compliant operation by Gate US could set a positive precedent, encouraging other international exchanges to consider entering the U.S. market. This could further solidify the U.S. as a global hub for crypto innovation. Job Creation: Establishing operations in the U.S. will likely lead to the creation of new jobs in various sectors, including technology, compliance, customer service, and marketing. This expansion isn’t just about trading; it’s about building a more robust and resilient financial infrastructure that integrates digital assets into the mainstream economy. The confidence shown by Gate.io in establishing Gate US is a strong indicator of this evolving landscape. What Challenges Might Gate US Face in the U.S. Market? While the regulatory environment is improving, it’s not without its complexities. Gate US will still need to navigate a nuanced landscape, including: State-Specific Regulations: The U.S. has a patchwork of state-level regulations in addition to federal guidelines. Obtaining licenses and operating compliantly in multiple states can be a significant hurdle. Consumer Protection: U.S. regulators place a strong emphasis on consumer protection. Gate US will need to demonstrate robust measures to safeguard user funds and data, as well as clear dispute resolution mechanisms. Public Perception: Overcoming any lingering skepticism about crypto exchanges, especially those with international roots, will require consistent communication and transparent operations. Talent Acquisition: Building a strong local team with expertise in both crypto and U.S. regulatory compliance will be critical. Successfully addressing these challenges will be key to the long-term viability and growth of Gate US in the American market. Looking Ahead: The Future of Crypto with Gate US The entry of Gate US marks a significant milestone in the journey of cryptocurrency adoption in the United States. It reflects a growing consensus that digital assets are here to stay and that a clear regulatory framework is essential for their responsible growth. As 2025 approaches, the anticipation around this launch highlights the dynamic nature of the crypto industry and its continuous evolution. For American investors, this means more choices, potentially better services, and a more competitive marketplace. For the broader industry, it signifies a move towards greater legitimacy and integration into the global financial system. The success of Gate US could very well pave the way for further international participation, fostering an even more interconnected and liquid global crypto market. This development is a testament to the persistent efforts of industry advocates and policymakers working towards a balanced and innovative approach to digital asset regulation. The stage is set for Gate US to play a crucial role in shaping the next chapter of crypto in America. *** Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) about Gate US 1. What is Gate US? Gate US is the U.S.-specific operation of the global cryptocurrency exchange Gate.io, launching spot crypto trading services for American customers. 2. Why is Gate.io entering the U.S. market now? Gate.io is entering the U.S. market in 2025 due to an anticipated improved and clearer regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies in the United States. 3. What types of services will Gate US offer? Initially, Gate US will focus on spot crypto trading, allowing users to buy and sell various digital assets directly. 4. How will Gate US ensure compliance with U.S. regulations? Gate US is expected to adhere strictly to U.S. federal and state-level regulations, including Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Know Your Customer (KYC) protocols, to ensure full compliance. 5. What are the potential benefits for American crypto users? Benefits include increased access to a wider range of digital assets, enhanced competition leading to better services and potentially lower fees, and a more secure trading environment due to regulatory adherence. 6. Will Gate US be available in all U.S. states? While Gate US aims for broad availability, specific state-level licensing requirements mean its services may roll out incrementally across different states. Users should check for availability in their particular state. *** If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your network! Help us spread the word about the exciting developments surrounding Gate US and the evolving crypto landscape in America. Your shares make a difference! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping cryptocurrency institutional adoption. title: Indonesia’s Crypto Tax Revenue Skyrockets 181% – But Volatility Raises Red Flags
body: Indonesia’s annual crypto tax revenue jumped sharply in 2024, marking its highest level since the government introduced taxation on digital assets in 2022. According to officials from the Directorate General of Taxes, the country collected 620 billion rupiah (around $38 million) last year, a 181% rise from the 220 billion rupiah recorded in 2023. The sharp increase reflects a broader surge in local crypto activity. Officials attributed the growth to a rise in transaction volumes, which reportedly reached 650 trillion rupiah ($39.67 billion) in 2024. This aligns with Indonesia’s growing crypto user base, which now stands at over 20 million people, surpassing the number of stock market investors. Crypto Tax Revenue in Indonesia Surged in 2024, but 2025 Off to a Slower Start However, the momentum may not last. Year-to-date figures for 2025 show a steep drop in tax revenue, with collections sitting at just 115 billion rupiah ($6.97 million) as of July. Officials point to crypto market volatility as a key factor behind the fluctuations. “Crypto is a long-term investment. The price can drop,” said Hestu Yoga Saksama, Director of Tax Regulations I at the Directorate General of Taxes. “It could spike, it could drop—it depends on what kind of fever it is. If the fever is high, then the reception will be good.” The tax was first introduced in 2022 and includes both Final Value Added Tax (VAT) and Article 22 Income Tax on crypto trading. In its first year, crypto taxes brought in 246 billion rupiah. The drop in 2023 raised concerns before the market rebounded sharply last year. To manage this growing sector, the government introduced several new regulations in 2025. Among them are updated ministerial decrees that set out tax rules for crypto asset trading and amend existing tax frameworks to reflect the evolving digital asset space. Indonesia has also reclassified crypto assets from commodities to financial assets. This move brings the sector under the oversight of the Financial Services Authority (OJK), indicating a shift in how the country views crypto’s role in its broader financial system. Yon Arsal, an advisor to the Minister of Finance, emphasized the need for collaboration. “It’s not enough to simply expand the scope,” he said. “We must also coordinate. We’re encouraging better coordination with our external stakeholders, including the Financial Services Authority.” Indonesia Raises Crypto Taxes on Foreign Exchanges, Cuts VAT for Buyers The government also rolled out tax reforms in August designed to shift activity toward domestic crypto platforms. Taxes on foreign exchanges were raised from 0.2% to 1%, while domestic platforms saw a smaller hike from 0.1% to 0.21%. Buyers, however, are no longer subject to VAT, creating an incentive for local trading. Crypto mining operations weren’t left out. VAT on mining has doubled from 1.1% to 2.2%, and a special 0.1% income tax for miners will be removed in 2026. After that, mining income will be taxed under regular personal or corporate tax rates. Speaking to CryptoNews, Gregory Cowles, Chief Strategy Officer of Intellistake.ai , noted that “crypto taxation needs to strike a balance. It’s fair that governments want their share, but overly aggressive or unclear policies risk pushing users offshore or into informal channels.” He continued, saying, “Especially in emerging markets, crypto is often more than just speculation; it’s a workaround for currency instability or limited access to banking. If taxation becomes too punitive, it could stifle that utility.” Indonesia implements sweeping cryptocurrency tax increases up to five times higher effective August 1 targeting the booming $39.67 billion crypto market. #Indonesia #Crypto https://t.co/INFY07kh8f — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 30, 2025 Despite the volatility challenges, officials view crypto taxation as a growing source of revenue. The government’s ability to capture earnings from the booming digital asset market, particularly among younger investors aged 18 to 30, is seen as a long-term opportunity. Still, the unpredictable nature of crypto prices poses a challenge for revenue planning. As Yoga noted, “It really depends on the market. If activity drops, so does the revenue.” As 2025 unfolds, the country’s crypto tax collections may continue to reflect the highs and lows of a volatile but rapidly expanding sector. Gregory Cowles further noted that “If governments start to treat crypto tax income as a stable budget item, they may be setting themselves up for disappointment.” Indonesia Ranks 3rd Globally for Crypto Adoption as Youth Trading Soars Indonesia’s crypto sector is seeing a sharp rise in activity, fueled largely by its young population. Over 60% of the country’s crypto investors are aged between 18 and 30, according to data from the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency (Bappebti). This surge in young investor participation has helped position Indonesia as the third-highest country on Chainalysis’s Global Cryptocurrency Adoption Index . Source: Chainalysis In 2024, Indonesia recorded more than $30 billion in crypto transactions by October , a steep rise from $6.5 billion the previous year. While still below the 2021 peak of $54 billion, this marks a 352% year-over-year increase. The number of registered crypto traders in the country also grew, reaching 21 million. At the regulatory level, the country is undergoing a shift in oversight. The transfer of authority from Bappebti to the Financial Services Authority (OJK), initially planned for January 2025 , was delayed due to the absence of supporting government regulations. Indonesia’s crypto regulation transfer to OJK, set for Jan. 12, faces setbacks due to incomplete government frameworks. #Indonesia #CryptoRegulation https://t.co/2V7xIu94eI — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) January 2, 2025 Once finalized, the OJK is expected to provide a more structured regulatory framework aligned with global standards, including clearer rules on trading, taxation, and exchange operations. The post Indonesia’s Crypto Tax Revenue Skyrockets 181% – But Volatility Raises Red Flags appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Analytics Firm Issues Serious Warning: “Bitcoin Below This Level Is Like Thin Ice, So Be Very Careful”
body: Cryptocurrency analysis firm CryptoQuant has published a striking analysis following the Bitcoin price drop from $118,000 to $115,000. According to the analysis, the price of Bitcoin suddenly jumped from $112,000 to $115,800 on July 10, 2025. However, it was claimed that this rise lacked robust technical and on-chain data. CryptoQuant analysts note that no support levels have emerged due to the price's rapid rise between these levels. According to onchain data, there is no significant trading volume or strong demand signals in the $112,000 to $115,800 range. Technically, there is no solid ground to hold the price at this time, as there has been no prior consolidation or resistance in this region. Related News: Major Split Within the Fed - Two Members Begin to Oppose Chair Jerome Powell, Here Are Their Statements While this wasn't a problem during the rally, it became a significant risk factor as the price turned lower. According to the analysis, Bitcoin is currently sitting at its last known support level, supported by on-chain data, “like a shelf with nothing underneath.” If this last support level is broken, the price is expected to move downward at the same rate. As long as the support level holds, there is no problem, but investors are advised to exercise caution, set stop-loss orders, and closely monitor price movements. Below this level, technically, it is considered a “gap,” and there are no structures in place to slow the decline. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Analytics Firm Issues Serious Warning: “Bitcoin Below This Level Is Like Thin Ice, So Be Very Careful”

title: Upbit TIA Suspension: Critical Alert for Celestia Holders
body: BitcoinWorld Upbit TIA Suspension: Critical Alert for Celestia Holders The dynamic world of cryptocurrency often moves at a rapid pace, with new developments emerging constantly. However, sometimes, the gears grind to a halt, prompting an urgent need for attention from traders and investors. Recently, a significant event unfolded in the South Korean crypto market, directly impacting users of one of the nation’s largest exchanges. We are referring to the unexpected Upbit TIA suspension , which has temporarily halted the flow of Celestia (TIA) tokens on the platform. For many, such an announcement can trigger immediate concerns about asset safety and accessibility. Understanding the nuances of why an exchange might implement an Upbit TIA suspension is crucial for navigating the crypto landscape with confidence. This article will delve into the specifics of this event, its implications, and what Celestia holders should know. What Exactly Caused the Upbit TIA Suspension? South Korean cryptocurrency exchange Upbit made an official announcement detailing the temporary suspension of Celestia (TIA) deposits and withdrawals. The primary reason cited for this measure was issues related to its blockchain node. A blockchain node is a fundamental component of a cryptocurrency network; it is a computer that maintains a copy of the blockchain and helps to validate transactions and blocks. When a node experiences issues, such as synchronization problems, network congestion, or software bugs, it can disrupt the smooth flow of operations. For an exchange like Upbit, maintaining a stable and synchronized node is paramount for accurately processing user transactions and ensuring the integrity of the funds. The Upbit TIA suspension was a proactive step to prevent potential discrepancies or losses during this technical instability. This situation highlights the technical complexities involved in running a major cryptocurrency exchange. Even with robust infrastructure, unforeseen technical glitches can occur, necessitating temporary halts to protect user assets and maintain system integrity. Upbit has stated that services will resume once the stability of the blockchain node is fully restored. The following table summarizes the immediate impact: Service Affected Current Status Reason for Upbit TIA Suspension Celestia (TIA) Deposits Temporarily Suspended Blockchain Node Issues Celestia (TIA) Withdrawals Temporarily Suspended Blockchain Node Issues Celestia (TIA) Trading Unaffected (Continues) Separate Operational Mechanism Why is an Upbit TIA Suspension a Big Deal for Traders? Any service suspension on a major cryptocurrency exchange can send ripples through the market and create anxiety among users. An Upbit TIA suspension , even if temporary, carries several implications for traders and the broader crypto community: Liquidity Concerns: For traders who rely on seamless deposits and withdrawals to manage their portfolios, a suspension means their funds are effectively locked on the exchange for that specific asset. This can hinder their ability to react to market changes or move assets to other platforms for different opportunities. Market Volatility: While trading for TIA on Upbit may continue, the inability to deposit or withdraw can impact supply and demand dynamics, potentially leading to increased price volatility. Traders might be forced to make decisions based on limited options. Trust and Confidence: Frequent or prolonged suspensions, regardless of the reason, can erode user trust in an exchange. Users expect reliability and transparency, especially when dealing with their financial assets. Upbit’s swift communication helps mitigate this, but the event itself highlights the inherent risks of centralized platforms. Opportunity Cost: Users holding TIA on Upbit cannot transfer their tokens to other exchanges or personal wallets during the suspension. This might mean missing out on staking rewards, arbitrage opportunities, or participation in other decentralized finance (DeFi) activities. It is a stark reminder that while centralized exchanges offer convenience, they also come with a degree of control over user assets during specific events. The Upbit TIA suspension serves as a practical example of this operational reality. What is Celestia (TIA), and Why is it Important? To fully grasp the context of the Upbit TIA suspension , it is helpful to understand Celestia itself. Celestia is a groundbreaking modular blockchain network designed to revolutionize how blockchains are built and scaled. Unlike monolithic blockchains that handle all functions (execution, settlement, consensus, and data availability) in one layer, Celestia specializes in one critical aspect: data availability. Here is why Celestia and its native token, TIA, are considered important in the evolving blockchain landscape: Modular Blockchain Architecture: Celestia introduces the concept of modular blockchains, allowing developers to deploy their own execution layers (rollups, app-chains) that can then use Celestia for data availability. This separation of concerns aims to improve scalability, flexibility, and sovereignty for decentralized applications. Data Availability Sampling (DAS): Celestia uses a novel technique called Data Availability Sampling, which allows light clients to verify that all transaction data is available without downloading the entire blockchain. This is crucial for the security and efficiency of rollups built on top of Celestia. Enabling Scalability: By offloading the data availability burden, Celestia allows other blockchain layers to focus solely on execution, leading to significantly higher transaction throughput and lower costs. This is vital for the mass adoption of blockchain technology. TIA Token Utility: The TIA token is integral to the Celestia ecosystem. It is used for transaction fees, staking to secure the network, and participating in governance decisions. Its utility underpins the economic model of the modular blockchain paradigm. Celestia represents a significant step forward in blockchain scalability solutions, making its token, TIA, a notable asset in the crypto space. The Upbit TIA suspension , therefore, impacts an asset that is central to a key area of blockchain innovation. How Can You Navigate an Upbit TIA Suspension? When an exchange announces a service suspension, it is natural to feel a sense of uncertainty. However, panic is rarely the best course of action. Here are some actionable insights for users affected by the Upbit TIA suspension or similar future events: Stay Informed Through Official Channels: Always prioritize information directly from Upbit’s official website, announcements page, or verified social media accounts. Avoid relying on unverified rumors or third-party reports that could be inaccurate. Understand the Nature of the Suspension: Differentiate between a temporary technical halt and a more severe, long-term issue. In this case, Upbit has clearly stated it is due to blockchain node stability and is temporary. Assess Your Immediate Needs: Do you need to access your TIA immediately for a specific transaction or opportunity? If not, patience is often the best strategy. For many, simply waiting for the issue to be resolved is the most prudent approach. Avoid Hasty Decisions: Do not attempt to move funds via unofficial means or engage in panic selling. Such actions can lead to losses or expose you to scams. Review Your Overall Portfolio: Use this as an opportunity to review your diversification strategy. Relying heavily on a single exchange or asset can increase your exposure to such events. Consider Self-Custody: For long-term holders, consider moving a portion of your assets to a hardware wallet or other self-custody solutions when services resume. This gives you direct control over your private keys and reduces reliance on exchanges. Proactive monitoring and a calm, informed approach are key to managing any Upbit TIA suspension or similar crypto market disruption. What Are Crypto Exchanges Doing During an Upbit TIA Suspension? Behind the scenes of an Upbit TIA suspension , exchange operators and their technical teams are working diligently to resolve the underlying issues. Running a cryptocurrency exchange involves managing complex systems, including thousands of blockchain nodes, vast databases, and high-volume transaction processing engines. When a blockchain node encounters problems, the exchange’s immediate priorities are: Diagnosis and Resolution: Technical teams are focused on identifying the root cause of the blockchain node instability. This could involve debugging software, updating configurations, or even replacing hardware components. Their goal is to restore the node to a stable, synchronized state as quickly as possible. Security and Integrity: During any technical issue, the paramount concern is the security of user funds and the integrity of the transaction ledger. Suspensions like the Upbit TIA suspension are often implemented as a preventative measure to ensure no funds are lost or corrupted during the instability. Communication with Users: Responsible exchanges, like Upbit, prioritize clear and timely communication. They issue public announcements to inform users about the issue, its nature, and what steps are being taken. Regular updates help manage user expectations and reduce anxiety. Testing and Verification: Before resuming services, the exchange will conduct thorough testing to ensure the blockchain node is fully stable and operational. This includes verifying synchronization, processing test transactions, and confirming data integrity. This meticulous process ensures that once services are back online, they remain reliable. Such incidents are a testament to the ongoing challenges in maintaining cutting-edge financial infrastructure in the rapidly evolving crypto space. Exchanges are continuously investing in robust systems and protocols to minimize downtime and enhance reliability. What’s Next After the Upbit TIA Suspension? Following an Upbit TIA suspension , the immediate next step is the resumption of services. Upbit has explicitly stated that deposits and withdrawals for Celestia (TIA) will be enabled once the blockchain node stability is fully restored. This typically involves a comprehensive internal review and testing phase to ensure that the underlying technical issues have been completely resolved and that the network is operating optimally. Users should remain vigilant and continue to monitor Upbit’s official announcement channels. Once the suspension is lifted, the exchange will likely issue another update confirming the resumption of services. At that point, users will be able to proceed with their TIA deposits and withdrawals as normal. It is important to remember that such technical pauses are not uncommon in the crypto industry, which operates on decentralized networks that can occasionally experience synchronization or connectivity issues. The swift and transparent action taken by Upbit in implementing the Upbit TIA suspension demonstrates their commitment to maintaining a secure and reliable trading environment for their users. Conclusion The temporary Upbit TIA suspension of Celestia (TIA) deposits and withdrawals serves as a timely reminder of the operational realities within the cryptocurrency ecosystem. While inconvenient for users, such measures are often necessary to safeguard assets and ensure the long-term stability of trading platforms. Upbit’s proactive response to its blockchain node issues underscores its commitment to user security and service integrity. For Celestia holders and the broader crypto community, this event highlights the importance of staying informed, understanding the underlying technology, and practicing sound risk management. As the crypto space continues to mature, we can expect exchanges to continually refine their infrastructure and communication protocols to minimize such disruptions. The core message remains: transparency and technical diligence are paramount in the world of digital assets. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Celestia (TIA)? Celestia is a modular blockchain network focused on providing data availability as a core service. Its native token, TIA, is used for transaction fees, staking, and governance within its ecosystem, enabling scalable and flexible blockchain development. Why did Upbit suspend TIA services? Upbit temporarily suspended Celestia (TIA) deposits and withdrawals due to issues with its blockchain node, which is a critical component for processing transactions and maintaining network stability. How long will the Upbit TIA suspension last? The duration of the Upbit TIA suspension is temporary. Upbit will resume services once the stability of its blockchain node for Celestia (TIA) is fully restored and thoroughly tested. What should TIA holders on Upbit do during the suspension? TIA holders should monitor Upbit’s official announcements for updates. It is advisable to avoid panic, refrain from attempting unofficial transfers, and review personal risk management strategies. Is my TIA safe on Upbit during the suspension? Yes, Upbit has implemented the suspension as a protective measure. Your TIA assets held on the exchange are generally considered safe, and the suspension is aimed at preventing any potential issues during node instability. Does the Upbit TIA suspension affect trading? Typically, such suspensions affect only deposits and withdrawals. Trading of Celestia (TIA) pairs on Upbit usually continues as normal, but it is always best to check the exchange’s specific announcement for full details. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network on social media. Your support helps us continue to provide timely and informative updates on the cryptocurrency market. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Celestia’s future oriented activity. title: Ripple Exec Reveals What Will Drive The XRP Price Value
body: Ripple Labs Chief Technology Officer, David Schwartz, has offered rare and pointed clarity on what drives the XRP price value in the long term, despite the company’s recent spotlight on its new stablecoin, RLUSD. In a recent exchange with an XRP supporter on social media, Schwartz emphasized that the crypto continues to sit at the core of Ripple’s payment infrastructure, especially as the main bridge asset in cross-border transfers. XRP’s Role As A Bridge Asset Is Still Central While RLUSD plays a specific role, Schwartz reveals XRP’s utility in real financial use cases will ultimately boost its value. His comments reaffirm Ripple’s longstanding plan for the digital asset, relying on XRP for its proven liquidity and built-in role on the ledger as it explores other digital options. Related Reading: XRP Set To Explode? Analyst Sees $5 Surge Any Moment – Details In his response, Schwartz directly addressed growing speculation that the company may be shifting its attention away from XRP in favor of its new stablecoin, assuring that the digital asset remains Ripple’s cross-currency asset that allows for fast, low-cost currency exchanges. While Schwartz didn’t share exact data, he said he was confident that the token’s usage “dwarfs every other asset” in Ripple’s system. XRP links to how the XRP Ledger functions, so an increase in ledger activity is almost guaranteed to drive more demand for the crypto token, naturally lifting its price value as it becomes more essential in global financial workflows. Schwartz argued that as real-world adoption of the Ripple blockchain networks grows, so will demand for XRP. The embedded demand, as more businesses and developers build on XRPL, is what could be the core driver of XRP’s future price value. Ripple CTO: Stablecoins Support, XRP Sustains Some community members worried that Ripple’s new stablecoin RLUSD, launched in December 2024, could replace the crypto token, but Schwartz clarifies that the stablecoin and XRP serve different purposes. He said stablecoins like RLUSD are better suited for use cases that require a fixed value, such as when companies post collateral or need to enter and exit markets without dealing with large price swings. Related Reading: XRP Blows Cold: Price Crash To $2.15 Still Possible If Buyers Falter Volatility in crypto markets can be disruptive in these scenarios, and stablecoins avoid that issue by holding a steady price. However, Schwartz believes that for most other applications, especially those related to real finance and long-term holdings, digital assets like XRP are still the better choice. He noted that, unless highly risk-averse, most long-term users would likely prefer holding the top digital asset over cash because of their potential for upside and active role in blockchain ecosystems. The Ripple exec added that as more institutions turn to XRPL for financial use cases, XRP’s role in facilitating quick currency movement becomes more vital, particularly in volatile markets where stablecoins may not be ideal. Schwartz made a subtle but important distinction, saying XRP’s place on XRPL is privileged. With this, the crypto token is less likely to be replaced or worked around, providing a long-term advantage that many other tokens may not have. Featured image from Unsplash, chart from TradingView.com
tags: XRP|David Schwartz|Ripple|Ripple CTO|Ripple Exec|ripple news|Ripple Price|xrp|xrp news|XRP Price|XRPUSD|xrpusdt

title: Huge Moment for XRP: Price At Key Support. Here’s What Is Next
body: XRP is at a pivotal turning point. After a powerful breakout and sharp rally, the cryptocurrency is now testing a major support level that could determine its next significant move. According to popular crypto analyst Cryptoes, this is a “make or break” moment for XRP, and the market is watching closely. Breakout From Long-Term Falling Wedge Cryptoes’ chart, posted on X, highlights a successful breakout from a falling wedge pattern that had defined XRP’s price action for months. The wedge, with a declining resistance line and a flat support base near $2.00, had formed between March and July 2025. Historically, falling wedges are considered bullish reversal patterns, and XRP respected that textbook behavior. In mid-July, XRP broke out of the wedge with strength, skyrocketing from around $2.10 to over $3.50 in a matter of days. This move not only confirmed the wedge breakout but also restored bullish momentum to the asset after a prolonged period of sideways consolidation. HUGE Moment for #XRP | Price at HUGE support level | Make or break! pic.twitter.com/tkqx6iO3oR — Cryptoes (@cryptoes_ta) August 1, 2025 Retesting Former Resistance As New Support Following the rally, XRP has now retraced slightly and is trading at approximately $2.94 as of report time. The price has pulled back to a key horizontal zone, the same $2.90–$3.00 level that had acted as strong resistance earlier this year, particularly in February and March. This zone is now being retested as support, a classic technical move that often precedes a continuation of the trend. As highlighted in Cryptoes’ chart, the blue horizontal band represents this critical area. If buyers step in and hold the line, XRP could establish a new base for another upward leg. However, failure to hold this level could expose XRP to a deeper retracement, with potential downside targets around $2.50 or even back toward the wedge breakout zone near $2.10. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Indicators Reflect Cooling Momentum, Not Reversal The chart also includes dotted parabolic SAR markers and a white curved trend line, both indicating that while bullish momentum has cooled, the uptrend remains technically valid . The parabolic SAR dots, now appearing above recent candles, suggest consolidation or a short-term pause, not yet a confirmed reversal. Corrections like this are common and even healthy following large, impulsive moves. A successful retest of this support could fuel renewed buying interest and set XRP on course to reclaim $3.50 and potentially push toward $4.00 and higher. XRP’s current price action is resting on a knife’s edge. After breaking out of a major wedge and rallying to multi-month highs, the asset now faces a critical test at the $2.90–$3.00 zone. According to Cryptoes, this is a crucial support level that must hold if the uptrend is to continue. The coming days will be decisive: either bulls defend this zone and spark the next leg higher, or a breakdown signals a broader correction. For XRP, this is indeed a huge moment, and what happens next will shape the trajectory for the rest of Q3. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. title: Trader Says All Eyes on One Bitcoin Level After BTC Loses Critical Support Line, Updates Outlook on Cardano and Three Other Altcoins
body: A closely followed crypto analyst says that one metric suggests Bitcoin ( BTC ) may decline to under $110,000 after losing a key support level. In a new thread, crypto trader Ali Martinez tells his 145,400 followers on the social media platform X that Bitcoin may decline more than 7% from its current value as the flagship crypto asset declines along with the broader financial markets. The crypto analyst looks at the Unspent Transaction Output (UTXO) Realized Price Distribution (URPD) model to determine the key support levels. The UTXO keeps track of the number of existing coins that last moved within a given price range. “Bitcoin has lost the critical $116,950 support. All eyes now on the next major level at $107,000.” Source: Ali Martinez/X Bitcoin is trading for $115,156 at time of writing, down 2.6% in the last 24 hours. Next up, the analyst says that Ethereum ( ETH ) rival Cardano ( ADA ) may be printing a similar bull pattern from 2020-2021 and eventually increase to more than $5. “Cardano is showing the same price structure as the last cycle, only this time, it’s unfolding more gradually. And it feels like we’re right at the beginning of an explosive move.” Source: Ali Martinez/X ADA is trading for $0.73 at time of writing, down 3.8% in the last 24 hours. Looking at decentralized oracle network Chainlink, the analyst predicts that LINK will increase to around $44.50 before the year’s end as it remains trading within the bounds of a bullish ascending channel. “As long as Chainlink holds above the $13 support level, the bullish outlook remains intact. No reason to be bearish just yet.” Source: Ali Martinez/X LINK is trading for $16.68 at time of writing, down 5.1% on the day. Next up, the analyst warns that peer-to-peer file storage network Filecoin ( FIL ) may plummet in value after losing key support levels on the three-day chart. “Filecoin appears to be breaking out of a channel, potentially eyeing a move to $0.89.” Source: Ali Martinez/X FIL is trading for $2.36 at time of writing, down 4.6% in the last 24 hours. Lastly, the analyst warns that Pepe ( PEPE ) may have a massive correction if the memecoin fails to reclaim a key level as support. “PEPE needs to reclaim $0.0000118 as support to avoid a potential drop to $0.0000097!” Source: Ali Martinez/X PEPE is trading for $0.00001072 at time of writing, down 4.6% on the day.
